title: external tools - telnet not work from mremoteng although it works well with standard CMD
author: longtth
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

add an external tools with 

- Display name: telnet
- Filename: `CMD`
- Arguments: `/k telnet %HOSTNAME% %PORT%`  ​
​
## Expected Behavior

mremoteng shoudld display CMND windows with telnet result 

## Current Behavior

although I could run telnet successfully with standard CMD, when I try with mremoteng it throws error that `'telnet' is no recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch f...

comments.author: LIyoai
comments.snippet: Try C:\Windows\Sysnative\telnet.exe instead of just telnet

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
